name: Add-n
description:
Wanna workout your brain? then tryout this challenging game you won’t regret ;)

Read the digits (aloud or in thoughts) then type a number in which each of the original digits is incremented by a number (based on Add-N) if the digits are 5294, the correct response is 6305 and if the task is called Add-3 then 8527 is the correct response

This game is not your average game, This is an experiment from the book "Thinking, Fast and Slow" by Daniel Kahneman. This game puts your "System 2" on a test, and as you play this game try recording your eyes. 

"We have a window to your soul"

😁😊😀
